title: SOLD! FS: N173 Bob Caruthers,#71-1, Batting-feet apart, trimmed
author: edjs

posts.post_title: SOLD! FS: N173 Bob Caruthers,#71-1, Batting-feet apart, trimmed
posts.post_content:
Hi all, I'm looking to sell my N173 Caruthers, BVG authentic, asking for $350.  I accept   PayPal,   check  or MO  for    this.  Price is net to  me, so please  add 3%   for   regular  PayPal.   Domestic shipping is free.    Shipping to other   countries, I will work  with  you on  price.
 
 Additional scans available on  request.  Thanks, and feel free to e-mail any questions: [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL].
 First commitment to buy will go before ongoing negotiations.
